Articles.Content:
I've try to play KSP few days ago and face serious perfomance issues.

I have a far above requirements PC (in case that last engine upadte was about in 2016)

i5 9400, 16gb 3200 ddr4, NVMe SSD, RTX2060S

KSP works fine most of the time, but switch lights ON on the surface(light source number setting on 4-64), or enetering atmo when atmo effects even on low setting drop my FPS below even 30.

Anyone faced this? And how to fix it, if possible?

Or it's engine fatal flaws?

Edited January 30, 2023 by Vegatoxi
Moved to tech support.

I'm not techy, I'm more of a mechanics guy, but for me, I just deal. Its not that big of a problem once you get used to it. I'm sure someone will give a solution though, these people are pretty nice.

To cope, I just zoom out until the re-entry effects leave render distance. It actually helps alot.

Granted, the ship looks like a tictac
